text: 16|35|(allahuveatâ€Œ) pankalikale certtavar parannu: allahu uddesiccirunnuvenkil nannalea nannalute pitakkanmarea avannu purame yateannineyum aradhikkumayirunnilla. avanre kalpana kutate nannal yateannum nisid'dhamakkukayum illayirunnu. at pealettanne avarkku mumpullavarum ceytittuntâ€Œ. ennal daivadutanmarute mel spastamaya prabeadhanamallate valla badhyatayumuntea
